QuestData.Title: Beach Bonfire
QuestData.Description: Do not let... my body lie in... the mud.$B$BSet my flesh... aflame.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 6 Driftwood in Azuregale Bay and build a funeral pyre for Jarl Throndyr.
QuestData.CompletionText: Throndyr deserved a more honorable death.
QuestData.RewardText: Hail Jarl Throndyr. May your soul find its place in Valhalas.
